snippet: Sidney Crosby said he planned to be in the lineup for the Pittsburgh Penguins when they play the Rangers at Madison Square Garden on Thursday night.

byline.original: By CHRISTOPHER BOTTA and JEFF Z. KLEIN

lead_paragraph: Sidney Crosby said he planned to be in the lineup for the Pittsburgh Penguins when they play the Rangers at Madison Square Garden on Thursday night.

headline.seo: Crosby to Return to Penguins’ Lineup Thursday
headline.main: Crosby Eyes Thursday Return Against Rangers
headline.print_headline: Crosby Eyes Thursday Return Against Rangers
